text: The membrane probe Laurdan (6-dodecanoyl-2-dimethylamino naphthalene, Invitrogen) was dissolved in DMSO (dimethylsulfoxide) to make a stock concentration of 1.8 mM. 293/LH2SN cells expressing IFITM1, 2 or 3, or none (Mock) were incubated with 1.8 mM Laurdan for 40 min at 37uC. To deplete cholesterol, a 50 mM stock solution of methyl-b-cyclodextrin (MbCD, Sigma-Aldrich) was prepared by dissolving in nanopure water. Cells were incubated with 10 mM MbCD for 1 h at 37uC. All cells were rinsed with PBS once before being processed for imaging.
